title: Indian Idol
extract:
Indian Idol is an Indian music competition television franchise based on the Pop Idol format. Several iterations of the series have been produced by different companies. The first series premiered in 2004. There have been 18 seasons to date.


Versions
  Currently airing – 1
  Upcoming for airing – 0
  Recently concluded – 1
  No longer airing – 1
